info.female_impression:
Anby often comes to the video store to borrow movies and returns them quickly, so she seems to watch a lot of movies.
Feelin' the pressure, bro? As the manager of the video rental store, it'd be embarrassing if the amount of movies we watch falls behind our customers.
info.male_impression: Honestly, I'm most curious about Anby's playlist. She's got her headphones on constantly... but what exactly is she listening to?
info.outlook_desc:
HIA License Archive Information:
Hollow Investigator - Anby. High aptitude for Ether. Permitted to conduct investigations, basic mining, etc. in known Hollows within the city (including companion Hollows).
Reminder: Similar to Nicole, Anby's investigator license has not been updated for a long time.
Self-funded tests are recommended as soon as possible to avoid any losses.
info.profile_desc:
Anby, the original member of Gentle House.
According to the New Eridu resident records, her identity as "Anby Demara" only exists after joining Gentle House, the name obviously being taken from Nicole. Before registering as an employee of Gentle House, all data relating to Anby is suspiciously blank.
Despite her extreme lack of common sense, Anby is well-versed in matters related to combat and is among the strongest combatants of the Cunning Hares.

Anby's greatest interest is movies, of which she likes an extensive range of genres. Due to an excessive obsession, she tends to take the stories in movies as reality.
Contrary to her seemingly emotionless appearance, Anby is easily moved by movie storylines.
Her favorite food is hamburgers because "they contain protein, carbs, and greens, taste good, and are even affordable � there's nothing else besides hamburgers."

mindscape_cinemas.description: When the 4th-hit of Anby's Basic Attack hits an enemy, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 12% for 30s.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Charge up for just a minute, and you're set to fight for an hour!" That's the sales pitch for these weapon expansion modules.
And they deliver exactly that.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Rapid Charge Mode

mindscape_cinemas.description: When Basic Attack: Thunderbolt hits a Stunned enemy, its DMG is increased by 30%. When Anby's EX Special Attack hits an enemy that is not Stunned, the Daze inflicted is increased by 10%.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Electric shocks will knock you out cold."
Looking at the enemy out cold at her feet, she added:
"At least, that's what happens in the movies."
mindscape_cinemas.name: Precision Discharge

mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: Run, slash, move like lightning. She is no amateur when it comes to Hollows�she's an expert.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Well-Disciplined

mindscape_cinemas.description:
When Anby launches a Chain Attack or uses her Ultimate, off-field Electric Agents recover 3 Energy.
For every 12% Energy Generation Rate Anby has, recover an additional 2 Energy, up to a maximum of 6.
mindscape_cinemas.description2: You won't last long fighting solo. An experienced Hollow Raider knows how to create opportunities for their teammates.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Conducting Charge

mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: Working for the Cunning Hares not only builds your mental toughness but also helps (or rather, forces) you to get in shape.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Street Experience

mindscape_cinemas.description: When Anby uses her EX Special Attack, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks). When she hits an enemy with her Basic Attack or Dash Attack, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing that attack's DMG by 45%.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
Coils of electricity flickered over her fingertips.
Anby raised her head, eyes brimming with determination beyond her years.
Perhaps, one day, she will be the one with total mastery over electricity.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Charging Field

descriptions.description:
When the active character is launched, press  to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Quick Assist: Thunderfall

descriptions.description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press  to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Defensive Assist: Flash

descriptions.description:
Press  after a Defensive Assist to activate:
Perform a spinning slash against enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Assist Follow-Up: Lightning Whirl

descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 slashes. The first 3 hits deal Physical DMG, the 4th hit deals Electric DMG.
descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Turbo Volt

descriptions.description:
After unleashing the 3rd hit of the Basic Attack, hold down or pause for a short while, and then press  to activate:
Unleashes a downward strike that deals Electric DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Thunderbolt

descriptions.description:
When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upwards slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Chain Attack: Electro Engine

descriptions.description:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press  to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area followed by several downward strikes, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Ultimate: Overdrive Engine

descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Dodge: Slide

descriptions.description:
Press  during a dodge to activate:
Slashes all nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG.
descriptions.name: Dash Attack: Taser Blast

descriptions.description:
Press  during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Dodge Counter: Thunderclap

descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes an upward slash that deals Electric DMG.
This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd-hit of the Basic Attack or Basic Attack: Thunderbolt.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Special Attack: Fork Lightning

descriptions.description:
With enough Energy, press  to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash that deals massive Electric DMG.
This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd hit of her Basic Attack or Basic Attack: Thunderbolt.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Lightning Bolt
